Dissolved Air Flotation (DAF) system installation for industrial wastewater treatment.

PT Toolmate Technologies Indonesia implemented a Dissolved Air Flotation (DAF) system for PT. Pulau Sambu at Guntung. The DAF system is designed to remove suspended solids, oils, and other contaminants from industrial wastewater through the flotation process, ensuring compliance with environmental standards.
Membrane Bioreactor (MBR) sewage treatment system for industrial laundry facility.

PT Toolmate Technologies Indonesia designed and installed a Membrane Bioreactor (MBR) based Sewage Treatment Plant for PT. Nirmala Laundry. The MBR system effectively treats wastewater from laundry operations, removing detergents, organic matter, and other pollutants to meet discharge standards.
HVAC Works - Air Con & Ducting Work
Complete HVAC works including air conditioning installation and large scale ducting for aircraft maintenance warehouse.

A comprehensive HVAC installation project for PT. Batam Teknik's Lion Air Warehouse facility. The project included installation of multiple air conditioning units, extensive insulated ducting systems, and ventilation equipment to meet aviation industry climate control standards for aircraft maintenance operations.
Sewage Treatment Plant project for high-rise residential building in Harbourbay Downtown.

PT Toolmate Technologies Indonesia completed a comprehensive Sewage Treatment Plant (STP) project for Menara Aria at Harbourbay Downtown. The project involved installation of treatment systems including control panels, pumps, and processing equipment for efficient wastewater management in this premium residential tower.
Control panel installation with VISALUX systems
Capacity expansion project utilizing MBR & MBBR systems for industrial wastewater management.

PT Toolmate Technologies Indonesia successfully completed the WTP (Waste Treatment Plant) expansion project at Panbil Industrial Park. This project involved upgrading the existing facility to handle increased industrial wastewater capacity from the growing number of tenants in the industrial estate.

PT Toolmate Technologies Indonesia delivered a precision HVAC system for PT. Sanmina SCI's electronics manufacturing facility. The project required stringent temperature and humidity control to maintain optimal conditions for sensitive electronic component production.

Full facility renovation including flooring works and M&E (Mechanical & Electrical) installation.

A comprehensive facility renovation project for PT. Rapala VMC, covering both civil works and complete mechanical & electrical systems upgrade. The project transformed the manufacturing facility to modern standards while maintaining production continuity.

PT Toolmate Technologies Indonesia executed comprehensive HVAC and structural works for PT. Yokogawa Manufacturing Batam. The project included installation of industrial cooling tower systems, chilled water piping, and protective canopy structures for outdoor equipment.
Advanced sewage treatment using Lamella clarifier and MBBR technology for hotel operations.

PT Toolmate Technologies Indonesia completed an advanced Sewage Treatment Plant project for Swissbel Hotel Harbourbay. The system combines Lamella clarifier technology with MBBR (Moving Bed Biofilm Reactor) to efficiently treat hotel wastewater, ensuring environmental compliance and water reuse potential.
Fabrication and installation of industrial boiler chimney system with stainless steel construction using heavy cranes.

A critical infrastructure project involving the fabrication and installation of an industrial boiler chimney at PT. Techwah Batam. The project featured tall stainless steel chimney construction with precision engineering, heavy crane operations for safe installation, and structural supports including access ladders and platforms.
